text:
April 27, 2018 / 5:28 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Village Bank And Trust Financial Corp - Qtrly Earnings Per Share $0.21 Reuters Staff
April 27 (Reuters) - Village Bank and Trust Financial Corp :
* VILLAGE BANK AND TRUST FINANCIAL CORP - QTRLY EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.21
* VILLAGE BANK AND TRUST FINANCIAL CORP - NET INTEREST INCOME AMOUNTED TO $4.01 MILLION FOR Q1 2018, AN INCREASE OF 3.6%, OVER Q4 2017 Source text - bit.ly/2r3XT2w Further company coverage:
